verses.1: Ngai un! Pilna in hong sam a, thungaihsut theihna hong kiko hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.2: Lamdung mual tung tengah, lamka citeng mun khempeuh ah dinga,
verses.3: khuapi lutna lampi gei ah, mi omna kongpi tual ah hong kiko a,
verses.4: “Mi khempeuh tungah ka hong thum a, leitung a om mi khempeuh kong sam hi.
verses.5: Ngaihsut kicing nai lote aw, na lungsim uh khanghamsak un. Mihaite aw, thu ngaihsun un.
verses.6: Ngai un, thu manpha kong gen ding hi; ka gen khempeuh thuman vive ahi hi.
verses.7: Ka thugente a man bekbek hi a, zuau thu ka deih kei hi.
verses.8: Ka gen khempeuh ahi vive hi a, zuau thu, thukawi om het lo hi.
verses.9: Thungaihsun theite adingin tel nop mahmah a, thu mu theite adingin siang mahmah hi.
verses.10: Ngun sangin kong thuhilhnate deih zaw unla, kham hoih pen sangin thutheihna deih zaw un.
verses.11: “Suang manpha sangin pilna ahi keimah ka hoih zaw a, kei tawh na hong tehpih theih ding uh a manpha dang om lo hi.
verses.12: Pilna ahi keimah in thuthuk muh theihna ka nei a, thu a telin theihna le a kilawm ngaihsut theihna ka nei hi.
verses.13: Topa zahtakna pen thusia muhdahna hi a, kiphatsakna le kihihsakna, gamtat sia le thuzuau ka mudah hi.
verses.14: Thu geelin ka sem khia a, thu theihtelna nei-in, kei ka thahat hi.
verses.15: Kumpite in a gam mite a uk nading, mi ukte in ngeina man a zat theih nadingin keimah in ka huh hi.
verses.16: Leitung a om mi ukte khempeuh in keima huhna bek tawh uk zo uh a, mi lian mi thupite in keima huhna bek tawh vaihawm zo uh hi.
verses.17: Kei hong itte ka it a, kei hong zong peuhmahte in hong mu uh hi.
verses.18: Piakkhiat theih ding hauhna le minphatna, daupaina le ma tutsak zawhna a kicingin ka nei hi.
verses.19: Keima kiang panin na ngahte uh ngun hoih pen sangin hoih zaw a, kham hoih pen sangin zong hoih zaw lai hi.
verses.20: Thuman lampi ka zui a, thutang lampi ka tawn hi.
verses.21: Kei hong itte ka hausak a, a inn dimin neihlelam ka pia hi.
verses.22: “ Topa in kei hong piangsak masa pen a, tangtawng a ama sep lak pan a masa pen ka hi hi.
verses.23: Tangtawng pek lai-in kei hong bawl a, leitung a om ma-in hong bawl masak pen ka hi hi.
verses.24: Tuipite a om ma-in kei ka suak khin a, keiʼ suah hunin lui tuite om nai lo hi.
verses.25: Mual liante a kibawl ma-in kei ka suak khin a, mual neute a kibawl ma pekin kei ka om khinta hi.
verses.26: Leitung khempeuh a bawl ma, lei them khat bek nangawn a bawl ma pekin kei ka om khinta hi.
verses.27: Amah in vantung bawlin tuipi kimkot ah vanpi mong ding a bawl laitak,
verses.28: amah in vantungah meiite kipsakin tuipi tuinakte a bawl laitak,
verses.29: tuipi tuite in ama cihna ban a khengin a luan loh nading thu a piak laitak ka om a, leitung bulpi a phuh laitak kei ka om hi.
verses.30: Na geel siampa bangin amah tawh kikhawlin keimah pen nisimin ama lungdamna ka hi a, ama kiang a om nuamsa-in,
verses.31: leitungah ka lungdam a, mihingte lakah nuam ka sa hi.
verses.32: “Tate aw, tu-in ka thugen hong ngai unla, kong gente zui le-uhcin lungdamna na ngah ding uh hi.
verses.33: Hong kihilhnate zui-in pilna ngah unla, thudon loin om mawk kei un.
verses.34: Ka thugenna a ngai, nisimin ka kong gei ah omin, ka inn ah a ngak mipa in lungdamna ngah ding hi.
verses.35: Kei hong mu mi in nuntakna a mu hi a, Topaʼ mai ah maipha ngah ahi hi.
verses.36: Ahi zongin kei hong mu lo mi, a mahmah a kisusia hi a, kei hong mudah peuhmah, a si nuam ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
